statements.sql: select `questions`.*, `question_tag`.`tag_id` as `pivot_tag_id`, `question_tag`.`question_id` as `pivot_question_id` from `questions` inner join `question_tag` on `questions`.`id` = `question_tag`.`question_id` where `question_tag`.`tag_id` = '1'
